DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate safety , tolerability PK AZD1446 Subjects give multiple dose administration either 7 Days ( Day 1 single dose , Day 2-6 multiple dos ) Part A optionally fractionate dos 1 Day Part B .
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics With Single Multiple Ascending Doses AZD1446
DOC.criteria: Male nonfertile female , young elderly Subjects , age ≥18 ≤50 ≥65 ≤80 Body mass index ( BMI ) 19 30 kg/m2 Clinically normal finding physical examination History clinically significant disease disorder History severe allergy/hypersensitivity reaction
DOC.keyword: investigate safety tolerability multiple ascend dose study Healthy subject
